content:
Sourdough baking is a wonderful adventure!

Of course, I'd be happy to help you with converting the ingredient measurements from grams to cups. Please provide me with the recipe and the gram measurements, and I'll do my best to convert them to cups for you.

Keep in mind that it's generally recommended to use a digital kitchen scale to measure ingredients by weight (in grams) when baking, as it's a more accurate method than measuring by volume (in cups). However, I understand that not everyone has a scale, and cup measurements can be a good approximation.

Please go ahead and share the recipe, and I'll get started on the conversions!
